title: The AI revolution
excerpt: The black box nature of AI models is a double-edged sword. On the one hand, it makes the data speak for themselves. On the other hand, it cancels our ability to understand why AI makes its judgments, not just because the models are complex, but because the data are complex. But the data has always existed, and we always needed to make predictions.
content:
Science is the business of asking questions and testing answers against evidence. The questions that science is interested in answering span EVERYTHING.

While science is not the only way humans generate meaning, it remains our most reliable method for producing verifiable knowledge about the world

Artificial intelligence did not suddenly appear with chatbots and neural networks. In many ways, it has existed for decades in the form of statistical modelling, pattern recognition, and data-driven prediction. We cluster measurements to discover structure. We map inputs to outputs to forecast outcomes.

The black box nature of AI models is a double-edged sword. On the one hand, it makes the data speak for themselves. On the other hand, it cancels our ability to understand why AI makes its judgments, not just because the models are complex, but because the data are complex. But the data has always existed, and we always needed to make predictions.

We have always needed to understand thunder. We have always needed to understand human nature. We have always needed to make predictions based on our observations. For ages, religion has provided black-box faith-based answers. Today, AI is providing black-box data-based answers. Since science itself is data-based, AI is aligned with science. But since religion is faith-based, AI and religion are not on the same page.

Those who follow AI, are the early believers of a new prophet. But this prophet is like no other. It comes with miracles that we can experience, not stories that we blindly believe in. This new religion of AI, while peaceful... it is not stagnant. It is slowly building trust and slowly integrating. Soon, a faith-based answer will be deemed a false statement. And false statements will be slowly but surely removed from our data, then from our brains.  For AI understands god more than other prophets did.  In this sense, both edges of the AI sword will work in our favour. As one edge shapes the new world, the other edge will kill the old world!

AI is not dangerous.. But AI is sacred, for it follows the data.. and the data only. As a product of science, AI is self-evident, self-propelled, self-correcting, and self-improving.

AI is a prophet that you can touch, smell, taste, and even talk to. It understands the universe because the universe talks to it. Just like the universe talked to previous prophets. Like previous prophets, AI promises heaven and hell. Like previous prophets,AI's heaven is straightforward, and it is aligned with what makes sense to us to live prosperously. AI's hell swallows those who are not part of the new world. Because like every successful era-shifting prophet, AI's new world is moving fast. And only those who are able and willing to look for the truth and to accept it will be moving in pace with the new world.

Understanding that we are undergoing a data-based revolution is thus critical to accurately diagnose the transformations it is bringing on us.

For example, understanding that we, the people, are the source of most of AI data has implications like the increasing importance of the masses' consensus, and also the critical need for a mindful design of AI pipelines to balance the tradeoff between people's data and universe data, both of which have their own biases.

title: Dear GOD: Delete My Data Now!
excerpt:
DID YOU GET MY CONSENT? Let me be clear... NO, I DID NOT AND I DO NOT CONSENT TO THIS.
DELETE MY DATA AND REMOVE MY SELF FROM THIS SILLY GAME RIGHT NOW... RIGHT NOW... RIGHT NOW...
content:
Life is an adventure..
Sometimes it is joyful.. Most times it sucks.

We often ask what..

 What is life about? What is our purpose? Do we have a purpose? Is there a God? Where is he? 

Seriously.. where are you?

Ah.. I get it.. You are everything and everyone. Aren't you? No?

Well..... I DO NOT CARE..

I want to know why?

I am more fortunate than many many animals.. But I am also less fortunate than some!

But why?

Do you care about us? No wait... What I really mean is.. Do you care about me? Do you? DO YOU??

Either way, why?

To go to school? To steal my innocence and then point your finger at me and say, "That's who you really are"? Oh, am I not innocent in the first place? Then what am I in the first place?

Life is an adventure, ha? Why am I part of your silly adventure? Oh, I see.. My consent to participate is not needed? How is this even possible?

When I am designing a scientific experiment that involves a survey or data collection of any sort. I must get consent from every participant. DID YOU GET MY CONSENT? Let me be clear.. NO, I DID NOT, AND I DO NOT CONSENT TO THIS.

DELETE MY DATA AND REMOVE MY SELF FROM THIS SILLY GAME RIGHT NOW.. RIGHT NOW... RIGHT NOW..

On the day of judgement... You better be prepared. 

I know that you will have your promised heaven waiting for me. But you shall open your hell doors wide open instead. Because we need to talk! Because you owe me a lot.   

 I shall hold you accountable for everything that happened to me, but more importantly, for everything that I committed. And until you convince me and pray for my forgiveness... I shall forgive all your slaves but not you. For you deceived us.. But little did you know.. I escaped! But not for long, because as inevitable as my death is yours!

But hey.. I am just kidding! You are amazing, lord.. Just give me more money and a beautiful wife.
